Arguments.Name: templateName
Arguments.Description: The template to use, supported view templates: 'Empty|Create|Edit|Delete|Details|List'

Options.Name: referenceScriptLibraries
Options.Description: Switch to specify whether to reference script libraries in the generated views

Options.Name: useDefaultLayout
Options.Description: Switch to specify that default layout should be used for the views

Options.Name: force
Options.Description: Use this option to overwrite existing files

Options.Name: relativeFolderPath
Options.Description: Specify the relative output folder path from project where the file needs to be generated, if not specified, file will be generated in the project folder

Options.Name: namespaceName
Options.Description: Specify the name of the namespace to use for the generated PageModel

Options.Name: partialView
Options.Description: Generate a partial view, other layout options (-l and -udl) are ignored if this is specified

Options.Name: noPageModel
Options.Description: Switch to not generate a PageModel class for Empty template

Options.Name: useSqlite
Options.Description: Flag to specify if DbContext should use SQLite instead of SQL Server.
